mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(bno, title, writer, content) values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum as rn, bno, title, writer, content, regdate, updatedate from( select * from freeboard order by bno desc) ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum}*#{amount}
mapper.update: update freeboard set title=#{title},writer=#{writer},content=#{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from freeboard
